content:
Hello, I am having an issue editing a resource, after it has been created. Basically, I was first editing a medication statement, and that worked fine, but after I tried editing an encounter and this error was thrown and the window for medication statement was still open.
pasted image

Ah - that's the 'edit' link from the current resource view? That's a work in progress on a better editor that's not complete yet so better to use the standard editing for now. Sorry about that (but thanks for the unintended feedback!)
No problem, happy to provide feedback, you've built a great web app, helps me a tons for testing my implementations! When issues arise I will let you know.

@David Hay
Hi I am getting below issue for my test fhir server..
